title: Hugh Watkins (referee)
text: Hugh David Watkins (born 3 September 1963) is a Welsh former <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> <a href="referee">referee</a>. He was selected as a touch judge at the <a href="2007%20Rugby%20World%20Cup">2007 Rugby World Cup</a>, before being used as a television match official later in the competition. In 2008, he was hired by the <a href="Worcester%20Warriors">Worcester Warriors</a> rugby team as a consultant in charge of reviewing the team's performances. That same year, he was hired as the <a href="video%20referee">video referee</a> on the UK television game show "<a href="Gladiators%20%282008%20UK%20TV%20series%29">Gladiators</a>".
